channel.title: Change Exp per hit PLEASE HELP!
channel.description:
In my server in each hit people get 1k exp in 1 hit, how can i change it to 360? And also when im tieving i changed the exp to 150 exp 1st stall but when lvl 10 or higher i get like 500 exp?
Please help!
